conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D isometric cutaway transformation with consistent wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection and depth; wall thickness and corners are mathematically consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the floor plan; all rooms accounted for. Minor deviation in the bathroom wall depth.

interior_elements.notes: Exceptional mapping of furniture; the L-shaped sofa, dining table, and kitchen appliances are perfectly translated.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no artifacts. Lighting is soft and enhances depth without obscuring detail.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom door orientation slightly adjusted from 2D swing.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation of the original architectural floor plan.
